summary: Moving from England to California, the youngest cousins of Elle Woods must defend themselves when their schools reigning forces turn on the girls and try to frame them for a crime.
cast: Milly Rosso|Becky Rosso|Christopher Cousins|Brittany Curran|Lisa Banes|Curtis Armstrong|Rose Abdoo|Bobby Campo|Chad Broskey|Chloe Bridges|Amy Hill|Kunal Sharma|Christoph Sanders|Tanya Chisholm|Teo Olivares|Caroline Fogarty|Trevor Duke-Moretz|Robert Belushi|Serena Berné|Gisselle Castellanos|Taryn Cohen|The Undercover Girls|Moises Amaya|April Betts|Trevor Blanding|Jonathan Davidson|Vittorio Wyatt Gray|Michelle Ann Harrison|Norma Jean|Devin Leigh|Natashia Lewis|Hollis McLachlan|Seth Sieunarine|David Tran
keywords: california|cheating on a test|female protagonist|long blonde hair|blonde woman
title: Unas rubias muy legales
